page.title: 18I.G.S YOUTH CENTRE (CONT)
page.content: and the problems that they face in life.They do not ignore such sensitive subjects as sex,crime and racial discrimination.By coming to this youth centre people are able to meet others with similar interests.The youth centre is also open to the public by providing such facilities as pre-school nursery and an old age pensioners club. The youth centre is highly thought of by all who attend it.Take for example Sophie Baker,my school friend,"The centre is brilliant.It is a great place for people who have nowhere else to go. I really have enjoyed the camping trips they have organised and am looking forward to the planned barge trip." It is a very good place for young people who haven't much money to spend and who need the back up services provided.
